title: The House in Birdgate Alley
description: London, 1889. Dr. John Williams suspects somebody has been blackmailing one of his patients, Sir Hugh Cockburn. The same day, the body of a young man is found floating in the Thames. Mere coincidence, or is there a connection? Williams' eccentric cousin, Cyril Fosterby, turns his mind to unraveling the mystery.
author: Anel Viz
